这个游戏太上瘾了。 我从来没有真正喜欢过游戏，但这款游戏改变了我的看法。 这是使用 128 个滴答服务器制作的最准确的 FPS 游戏之一。 这个游戏需要激情、奉献、努力、技巧和大量练习，因为当你触发你的枪时，每个像素都很重要。 有传言称 CS:GO 将在 2 周内转向 Source 2 引擎，对此真的很兴奋。

I am quite disapointed my "fart gun" is not a weapon in this puny game. I am also disapointed there is only a 5 limit team name. There is no way I can possibly fit all of my minions in the same game! I am very dissapointed but they do have a new skin after me which I am very thankful for. A great artistic masterpeice down to the tiniest detail. - There is more to  this world then eating jelly. Me, Dr Nefario, signing out.
